visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and configure the chart with a white background, legend, and specific margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a white background with specific margins for better visual spacing. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius, also with styled labels and a title. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes monthly average temperature data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
